In development:

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.40 release Android Beta Feedback
On a large format screen (e.g. foldable), split screen seems to have been enabled (chats on the left side) but selecting a chat doesnâ€™t open up the corresponding chat on the right side. Rather or just opens up in full screen view somewhat negating the need for a split screen UI. [1000000948] [1000000946]
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.40 release Android Beta Feedback
The split pane UI is still in heavy active development and was enabled by mistake

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.40 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.40 release
Allow Android / iOS devices (e.g. tablets, but also phones) to be linked to the primary device, i.e. used as secondary device like the Desktop app
Why not allow Android tablet as a linked device?

posts.cooked:
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.63 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.63 release

Will the release of the tablet/foldable UI coincide with full Android tablet linked device support, or will they be separate?

Android linked device support will be separate from the tablet/foldable UI changes.

(20 characters)
